data.what_is:
Encharge helps small businesses and startups to grow their revenue by sending behavior-based emails and automating repetitive tasks across the whole customer journey. 

2,000 companies, from solopreneurs to some of the most promising and successful startups like Landbot, rely on Encharge for their email marketing and marketing automation needs.
data.product_description: Marketing automation software for startups and digital businesses. Send emails based on what people do on your website and in your product and automate your marketing process across the user journey.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Great for email sequences and businesses new to email marketing and marketing automation
plan_features: Dozens of integrations including Facebook Ads, Typeform, Stripe, and more

pricing_plans.plan_description: Great for advanced marketing automation for SaaS businesses and other digital businesses that rely on behavior-based automation.
Contact us at support@encharge.io to request pricing for more than 50,000 subscribers.
plan_features: Everything included in Premium plus Dedicated account manager and Free onboarding

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file. 37 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications. 37 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 31 Encharge reviews. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements This feature was mentioned in 36 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action. 36 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc. This feature was mentioned in 32 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: As reported in 22 Encharge reviews. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.  17 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: As reported in 34 Encharge reviews. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: As reported in 27 Encharge reviews. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically This feature was mentioned in 70 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending. This feature was mentioned in 68 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring. This feature was mentioned in 67 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores 63 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information. This feature was mentioned in 42 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects. This feature was mentioned in 52 Encharge reviews.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion. This feature was mentioned in 52 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 56 Encharge reviews. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords. This feature was mentioned in 45 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history. 58 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 56 Encharge reviews. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 66 Encharge reviews. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization. This feature was mentioned in 55 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps. 60 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks. 59 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: As reported in 59 Encharge reviews. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system. 50 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: As reported in 44 Encharge reviews. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: As reported in 35 Encharge reviews. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Based on 40 Encharge reviews. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Based on 32 Encharge reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: As reported in 28 Encharge reviews. Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions. This feature was mentioned in 31 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets. This feature was mentioned in 31 Encharge reviews.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails. 30 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time 29 reviewers of Encharge have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 58 Encharge reviews. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 48 Encharge reviews. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 34 Encharge reviews. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 31 Encharge reviews. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors. This feature was mentioned in 28 Encharge reviews.

initial_reviews.review_title: Perfect builder and management tool for digital marketing with automation
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
The processing and workflow management is quite amazing and intuitive as Encharge has variety of automation tools which makes the processing accurate and time saving for all.
For time management and best designing of advertising posts, templates, emails it is the best and very helpful applications as there are already ready layouts available in this for easy modifying your posts and creating one of the professional and attracting stuff for you.
The automation marketing feature available in it schedules all the uploads and mails for you and your clients. Keeps and gathers all the information of the visitors on your posts and collects there feedbacks for and there requirements.
The process of integrating the application with multiple webbooks, webpages and platforms is so easy and flexible to process and unify the data.
The most helpful feature was its drag and drop feature that will help you a lot and make your working experience more soppesticated and reliable in importing and gathering the data from one tab to another. It will save a lot of time for you specially its automation tools.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
I have faced a little bit of lag of bugs in some of the featires of Encharge platform, like when processing multiple sites or integrating with multiple e-commerce webpages or websites, the processing takes a lot of time when processing this platform with e-commerce tools.
And also the proper and regular updates in the UI of the platforms are also required for smooth workflow experience.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Encharge has made it very easy for me to built the emails, social media posts and landing pages for our customer haldles. Seamlessely this appliucation and its features have definetly helped us in integrating and managing our marketing content. And making the proper listing of the cutomers details and reports also being generted automatically with the AI tools of this application. The automation marketing has made our work more easier and increased our sales and enhenced our productivity.

initial_reviews.review_title: It's a simple email automation tool for small and medium size business.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I like the detailed metrics and campaign reports of each campaign. Another feature that makes the email effective is the drip flow of emails where I can schedule emails on different days.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
I do not like that it does not have a feature for an email verification built-in system in it. Every time I have to upload emails, I have to use a third-party tool.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's solving my email automation problem, with this tool, I can send up to 1000 emails in one go and it saves my time & effort. It's benefitting me by doing segmentation of emails and drip flow.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent digital marketing tool for building businesses from scratch
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
It's an amazing integration platform and goes well with other software and digital tools. I love that the UI and implementation are very simple which makes it the best option compared to some big old names in the industry. I like that there's not only email automation, but you can also connect and post to your social networks. Dashboard analysis provides accurate and insightful data-driven insights that help companies determine the right future projections. I love that it allows you to run various promotional ads and social engagement posts online without much manual intervention. It can help with email management, quick landing pages, and marketing automation.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
It takes a little time to learn the functions and features as a whole, especially for a newbie. It has some of the limitations of built-in reports. I would like them to improve the landing page and the interface of the email page. Despite the above mentioned, we really have no complaints, even their turnaround times for custom projects have been quick and custom, so no major complaints.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps us consolidate all the information we need to understand how to best serve our stakeholders in one place instead of being disaggregated across multiple platforms. This is a complete email marketing automation tool. Thanks to this software, little by little we are able to better understand how our data subjects access and use our information so that we can be more effective in our defense. This platform adds creative features and personalizes posts for us based on built-in AI and ML technology. Onboarding support was amazing in helping us transition from funnels and contacts.

initial_reviews.review_title: Perfect email marketing and automation Service
This may be another home run for me (from an Activecampaign user)
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Looking at all the things that this platform has, and checking out the user interface I can already see that this is going to be a game changer for me.

I've been an Activecampaign user for a few years now, and although it's worked pretty well for me, it's expensive, and I've never been a big fan of the UI.

Some of the features included here are ones I would have to pay extra for on AC, and I'm honestly surprised to be seeing them included.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
There's no integration with Pipedrive yet, but it's on the roadmap so really not an issue at this point. It's coming!

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm looking for a more cost-effective and robust alternative to what I'm currently using.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good Deal--Poor Communication
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
This is a very powerful CMS, similar in abilty to Constant Contact and others. I got a great deal on it for a lifetime license from AppSumo, so the price was right. There are tutorial videos to guide you in setup, but there are a few kinks (more on those in a moment). Once you overcome those, the software is much easier and better to use.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
When it comes to setup, you are kind of on your own except for the tutorials. And be warned: if you make a mistake, you won't get a kind, pleasant email from customer service, at least not in my experience. The response was rude, almost expected me to know the mistake I made, and as a soloprenuer/small business that was disheartening. If I hadn't already spend hours setting things up, I would have ditched this software right then. As of now, I still have it and use it on a limited basis. Maybe it will get better over time and with some updates.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
So this is a CMS/automated marketing flow. You can do a lot with it, but you will also need Zapier to make some integrations with your website and other places work. It is smooth, fast, and does offer a more robust platform than some of the cheaper ones. It's a great "futture tool", or so I hope.

There are tutorial videos to guide you in setup, but there are a few kinks (more on those in a moment). Once you overcome those, the software is much easier and better to use.

And be warned: if you make a mistake, you won't get a kind, pleasant email from customer service, at least not in my experience. The response was rude, almost expected me to know the mistake I made, and as a soloprenuer/small business that was disheartening. If I hadn't already spend hours setting things up, I would have ditched this software right then. As of now, I still have it and use it on a limited basis. Maybe it will get better over time and with some updates.

It is smooth, fast, and does offer a more robust platform than some of the cheaper ones. It's a great "futture tool", or so I hope.

initial_reviews.review_title: Encharge has been a Delight!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Encharge has been a life-saver since purchased.  I've used numerous automated email marketing applications, however none of them have simplified the process of segmenting a user's journey based upon his/her interactions with the campaign as much as Encharge has done.

In addition, Encharge capability to integrate with other well known Email marketing platforms, is an absolute selling point in my opinion.  Just think about it, Encharge doesn't force you to cancel or get rid of the platform your already using, but instead allows you to integrate one with the other.

Simplicity, something most of us cherish, I know I do.

Thanks Encharge 

What do you dislike about Encharge?
So far all the features has been wonderful.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?

initial_reviews.review_title: Great email marketing platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
The platform is easy to use with a wide variety of features you usually can't find anywhere else. We love the site tracking and direct integration with web hooks. This allows us to link it to different tools we're using.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
Some of the features are buggy. Reporting is still very basic and we're not able to do more in-depth analysis on our email marketing campaigns. We can't search for tags properly so it can be time-consuming to search through dozens of tags we're using.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted a platform that will help us do more advanced sequences for our email marketing. This includes conditions, filters and time delays. We're able to use a wide variety of triggers to trigger an email campaign. e.g someone visits our sites, takes an action and receives an email.

I am a web developer cum Sales Funnel Builder. I have been in the industry for 10 years and I came across different autoresponder tools in the market but this Encharge tool is phenomenal with its UI. And I enabled Tier 2 Plan with 10k Users. I have seamless connection and integration with my blog along with elementor pro plugins and with my custom chatbot tool. So I that I can get quality leads subscribers in my email list. This is how I grow my email list with this autoresponder also I am able to set email drip sequences too. So that the user will get a mail with some point of delay. I can automatically send customized emails to your subscribers, followers, and fans.

How can you turn your followers and subscribers into customers and keep them up-to-date on exciting news and projects?

The broadcast feature lets you send targeted, one-off emails to specific audiences.

You can use Encharge's powerful segmentation capabilities to get your newsletter in front of the right eyes, or A/B test emails to increase those open rates.

The finest feature with the alternative tool has this feature that is not available in Encharge. The Landing Page Builder tool is missing.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have an issue with building my email list with my blog website. I utilized the Encharge integration with the third-party elementor plugin so that I got seamless integration to build my email list.

I would highly encourage anyone looking for an email automations/marketing tool to try this. I am getting rid of some of my softwares as this one handles multiple aspects by itself. Go for it!

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent Alternative To MailChimp or Active Campagin
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Encharge combines an easy UI with a range of integrations to form a powerful email marketing automation tool.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
Quite strict when it comes to Spam. Understandable, as deliverability is vital for email marketing. However, I have an old list of opted-in subscribers that I have never contacted. I almost don't want to use that list for fear people won't recognize my company and report me as spam.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
My main reason for using Mailchimp is their automation capabilities. The pricing of Mailchimp cannot allow me to scale as well as I would like. I am excited to find many of the same features in Encharge that I am familiar with in Mailchimp.

I have been pleased with the native integrations and how easy it has been to set up my campaigns. It would be wonderful if they could integrate natively with Thrive Leads so I could have a lead generation and email marketing stack made in heaven.

initial_reviews.review_title: One of the top email marketing automation platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
There are two things I really like about Encharge. The first part is their automation sequence builder (aka flow builder) that comes with dozen of useful templates, and the second part is the many ready to use native integrations with market leading platforms such as hubspot, calendly, intercom, typeform, and integrators such as zapier, pabbly, and integrately.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
There's a pretty high learning curve if one has little or no experience in email marketing automations. There are many parts to the puzzle that are required to set up and tweak to get things right. It also takes a lot of work to set up segmentations and sequences, especially when tracking visitors/users behaviors.

Recommendations to others considering Encharge:
Start with a trial then if you're stuck then go through their help sections. It is likely you'll get overwhelmed in the beginning. Also try to compare with other alternatives in this space. Many do the same things with minor differences. Many would prefer one of another because of just preference and not about the system.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Encharge helped us improved our accuracy and efficiency in our marketing email communications. We are getting better numbers. This is partly because of the amount of data that we got from various sources and we put it into Encharge and use their powerful tools to create more complex and better automation flows.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent digital marketing tool for building businesses from scratch
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
It's an amazing integration platform and goes well with other software and digital tools. I love that the UI and implementation are very simple which makes it the best option compared to some big old names in the industry. I like that there's not only email automation, but you can also connect and post to your social networks. Dashboard analysis provides accurate and insightful data-driven insights that help companies determine the right future projections. I love that it allows you to run various promotional ads and social engagement posts online without much manual intervention. It can help with email management, quick landing pages, and marketing automation.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
It takes a little time to learn the functions and features as a whole, especially for a newbie. It has some of the limitations of built-in reports. I would like them to improve the landing page and the interface of the email page. Despite the above mentioned, we really have no complaints, even their turnaround times for custom projects have been quick and custom, so no major complaints.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps us consolidate all the information we need to understand how to best serve our stakeholders in one place instead of being disaggregated across multiple platforms. This is a complete email marketing automation tool. Thanks to this software, little by little we are able to better understand how our data subjects access and use our information so that we can be more effective in our defense. This platform adds creative features and personalizes posts for us based on built-in AI and ML technology. Onboarding support was amazing in helping us transition from funnels and contacts.

all_reviews.review_title: Good Deal--Poor Communication
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
This is a very powerful CMS, similar in abilty to Constant Contact and others. I got a great deal on it for a lifetime license from AppSumo, so the price was right. There are tutorial videos to guide you in setup, but there are a few kinks (more on those in a moment). Once you overcome those, the software is much easier and better to use.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
When it comes to setup, you are kind of on your own except for the tutorials. And be warned: if you make a mistake, you won't get a kind, pleasant email from customer service, at least not in my experience. The response was rude, almost expected me to know the mistake I made, and as a soloprenuer/small business that was disheartening. If I hadn't already spend hours setting things up, I would have ditched this software right then. As of now, I still have it and use it on a limited basis. Maybe it will get better over time and with some updates.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
So this is a CMS/automated marketing flow. You can do a lot with it, but you will also need Zapier to make some integrations with your website and other places work. It is smooth, fast, and does offer a more robust platform than some of the cheaper ones. It's a great "futture tool", or so I hope.

I am a web developer cum Sales Funnel Builder. I have been in the industry for 10 years and I came across different autoresponder tools in the market but this Encharge tool is phenomenal with its UI. And I enabled Tier 2 Plan with 10k Users. I have seamless connection and integration with my blog along with elementor pro plugins and with my custom chatbot tool. So I that I can get quality leads subscribers in my email list. This is how I grow my email list with this autoresponder also I am able to set email drip sequences too. So that the user will get a mail with some point of delay. I can automatically send customized emails to your subscribers, followers, and fans.

But now what?

How can you turn your followers and subscribers into customers and keep them up-to-date on exciting news and projects?

The ideal solution is Encharge Auto Responder automation tool.

The broadcast feature lets you send targeted, one-off emails to specific audiences.

You can use Encharge's powerful segmentation capabilities to get your newsletter in front of the right eyes, or A/B test emails to increase those open rates.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
The finest feature with the alternative tool has this feature that is not available in Encharge. The Landing Page Builder tool is missing.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have an issue with building my email list with my blog website. I utilized the Encharge integration with the third-party elementor plugin so that I got seamless integration to build my email list.

You can have created great content for your blog, YouTube channel, or podcast and have gained a solid following.

But now what?

How can you turn your followers and subscribers into customers and keep them up-to-date on exciting news and projects?

The ideal solution is Encharge Auto Responder automation tool.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent Alternative To MailChimp or Active Campagin
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Encharge combines an easy UI with a range of integrations to form a powerful email marketing automation tool.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
Quite strict when it comes to Spam. Understandable, as deliverability is vital for email marketing. However, I have an old list of opted-in subscribers that I have never contacted. I almost don't want to use that list for fear people won't recognize my company and report me as spam.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
My main reason for using Mailchimp is their automation capabilities. The pricing of Mailchimp cannot allow me to scale as well as I would like. I am excited to find many of the same features in Encharge that I am familiar with in Mailchimp.

I have been pleased with the native integrations and how easy it has been to set up my campaigns. It would be wonderful if they could integrate natively with Thrive Leads so I could have a lead generation and email marketing stack made in heaven.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the top email marketing automation platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
There are two things I really like about Encharge. The first part is their automation sequence builder (aka flow builder) that comes with dozen of useful templates, and the second part is the many ready to use native integrations with market leading platforms such as hubspot, calendly, intercom, typeform, and integrators such as zapier, pabbly, and integrately.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
There's a pretty high learning curve if one has little or no experience in email marketing automations. There are many parts to the puzzle that are required to set up and tweak to get things right. It also takes a lot of work to set up segmentations and sequences, especially when tracking visitors/users behaviors.

Recommendations to others considering Encharge:
Start with a trial then if you're stuck then go through their help sections. It is likely you'll get overwhelmed in the beginning. Also try to compare with other alternatives in this space. Many do the same things with minor differences. Many would prefer one of another because of just preference and not about the system.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Encharge helped us improved our accuracy and efficiency in our marketing email communications. We are getting better numbers. This is partly because of the amount of data that we got from various sources and we put it into Encharge and use their powerful tools to create more complex and better automation flows.

What's not to like about this software? Automations are amazing, you can create great funnels, the customer service is nothing short of fantastic and ultra responsive.

I've used plenty of email marketing software and this combined with ease of use is absolutely amazing.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
Not much to dislike - the only thing I can mention is the pricing, however, for good email marketing software you have to pay a price, and this is lower than others like it.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm solving the email marketing problem, to email my list every single day. But I'm also solving the problem of time - you can create flows and automation in this tool that give me more time in my day. Including great sequences upon signing up for the list, purchasing a product, or even emailing my list about an upcoming product. Give me an hour and I can have a 10 email sequence set up for my list.

Amazing.

all_reviews.review_title: Just the tool I needed.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Just the tool I needed.
I wanted to write my review after testing the product for a while and getting to know all its features. Finally, the result has been very positive, and I have totally migrated to the tool. At first I contemplated it as a complementary utility since its automation system attracted me, but then I realized that it is much more than that and fulfilled everything I needed perfectly.

I must say that after a few weeks and some campaigns, I am delighted with my tool change and with using Encharge. Some of the points that stand out and I have liked the most are:
- Your drag and drop builder seems perfect to me. Complete and powerful enough, but keeping the ease of use and simplicity.
- Its integrations with other applications are very complete and you will find everything you need.
- Its automation system is incredibly visual and easy to use and learn.
- The support and extra material they provide are complete and very useful.
- The platform and its design are very well taken care of, it is pleasant, easy to navigate and very stable.

I have had a good experience, and I recommend this platform to anyone who is starting out in marketing automation or needs a good platform to send their emails.Just the tool I needed.

all_reviews.review_title: Great automation, needs a form builder
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
The software is very intuitive and the automation flows are very nice to setup, the customer support is amazing and the segmentation and lead scoring features are just what we need to  nurture and segment our leads and our client's leads.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
We were very frustrated with the lack of a native form builder inside the software; we have to go to an external app to connect with encharge, in the current market status a below the par offer. Similar apps offer native form builders (and landing page builders) even with their free tier. Not everyone is a coder and can create zaps (paying for zaps) to use a form in their landing page.

Recommendations to others considering Encharge:
We are not very happy with the software; we will consider continuing using it if the software can have its native form builder since creating an integration for each of our clients and/or our landing pages is not what we look into as automation software.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation of email marketing, lead nurturing, segmenting users, and driving more sales. We are struggling with the implementation since we have to pay an additional amount to an external app to get the leads into the platform.

all_reviews.review_title: Best investment so far!!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I love that I am easily able to create an email campaign without pulling my hair out!! It was so easy to use, and when I needed help, I contacted their helpdesk for immediate assistance!

What do you dislike about Encharge?
I wouldn't say I like that I can't create a landing page right in the program itself. I have to create landing pages on Mailchimp and link to Encharge.  It isn't complicated or anything to do; it's just an extra step. I would love to cut Mailchimp out altogether.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I can create great email campaigns as if I am a fortune 500 company, but in reality, I am a tiny small business. I love how easy it is and that I really can create solutions to problems I may have with emails being disregarded or ignored. Using the metrics they provide so organized, I can see where I need to improve my emails and be able to increase my opens and sales as well.

all_reviews.review_title: Perfect software for email and automation!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I have been using other email marketing platforms over the years and have never used an automation app before.  It's an excellent investment for our business. After trying it out to see if it would work for our particular use (a membership site for one), we wanted to see how it would work to make our customers connect with us on multiple levels and the ease of use for us. Encharge came out on top as a modern solution for our business.

Setting up an account is easy, and you will love everything about it. Broadcasts are amazing to set up, including 'flows' and 'triggers.' Very impressive, as are the stats that mirror your connection to your customers. I can't wait to broadcast to our customers for our upcoming products and services.

In my experience, this is the top of the market for automation/email delivery after looking for quite some time. And to top off the offering, the customer service is fantastic. The support is timely, and the support documents are superb. On the other hand, the customer service is terrific.

They have partnered with both Sendgrid and Amazon SES -- the world's most reliable cloud-based email delivery platforms, so I am happy that the reliability of delivery will be there for a long time to come.

Don't hesitate to purchase if you think this software can work for you and your business. I am one happy customer of Encharge!

What do you dislike about Encharge?
There are no 'cons,' really. If you have used Active Campaign in the past, it should be a breeze to set up and get started.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have used email platforms for years (Mailchimp, Sendfox, etc.), but I have never previously used automation software. For our new membership site, Encharge will provide smooth customer service and more time to gain extra subscribers.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Value Autoresponder
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I can configure it with my hosting service to achieve improved deliverability and open rates. Less likely to be considered spam. I saw deliverability and open rates double up within the first week.

It also comes with a free email validity checker. In the first week, I detected 2 people who had left their organizations and removed their emails.

Drag-and-drop block system that makes creating emails super easy.

Allows duplication of previous broadcasts and emails.

Ability to add CC & BCC to broadcasts.

Has a beautiful automation creation map function that's based on actions taken or not taken by receipients.

And you can send it at the receipient's time zone too.

You can tag and segment your contact list.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
Can't send broadcast to more than one segment at a time. You'll have to duplicate the broadcast and send to another segment.

Also you can't see who skipped the email.

Recommendations to others considering Encharge:
Contact Support if you need any clarification and they will answer within the same day even on weekends. Also the UI is a bit different that others I've used but you get the hang of it quite intuitively.

Submit any feature requests and check out their roadmap for new features being developed.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Improved deliverability and open rates.

Better personalization of Subject Line, which the previous couldn't fix.

More contacts for lower price.

all_reviews.review_title: We might have found the right one!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
We've been trying different email marketing platforms in the last few months - and I think we've found the right one! At first, we just tried out Encharge because we were intrigued by its high ratings. We wanted to see what sets it apart from other email marketing platforms that we're already familiar with and if it's worth the hype that it has been receiving.

Let's be honest - it can be tedious to move your contacts from one place to another - especially if you've already set different tags and segments to all of them. But so far, it's been easy navigating through Encharge's platform and is continuously exceeding our expectations. They have features that don't exist in other platforms - or if they have something similar - Encharge has done it better.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
So far, there's nothing that I dislike about the platform.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're trying to find a platform that will best send and organize our campaigns and contacts. So far, Encharge has been delivering what we need and is making things easier for us.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the best value tools around for email marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Encharge is remarkable. My needs are complex, and include creating complicated flows and data imports for one big client, with info being pulled in from several different sources, before being optimised for many different conversions. Encharge handles this very, very well indeed. And for a very affordable price.

Encharge's functionality and ease of use will give me back many hours of my time each month, which I can now put to far better use. It didn't take me long to learn how to set up Encharge to accomplish what I needed it to, and I am now diving deeper into its potential, as using the tool has been a delight so far.

I will happily recommend Encharge to others, and do not intend to switch away from using it at any time soon.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
Encharge's onboarding could perhaps be more extensive. I have had to figure out more of the tool's complex functionality myself than would have been ideal.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Encharge has made my work doing email marketing much, much easier! The options Encharge offers gives me a blank canvas to configure my email marketing campaigns exactly how I need them to operate.

all_reviews.review_title: Encharge your business with Encharge!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Setup the account is easy, and you'll love it. Broadcasts are amazing to launch new products or services. On the other hand, the automation is cool, and the stats are impressive. I think that this is, for most, one of the top email marketings that you'll find in the next years. On the other hand, the customer service is amazing. You'll love it. One of the top problems in email marketing are Deliverability and open rate. In this sense, Encharge will help you to have amazing deliverability and good open rates. For what I know they have partnered with both Sendgrid and Amazon SES -- the world's most reliable cloud-based email delivery platforms. So I'm pretty sure that your emails are going to work and wont arrive to spam, which is one of the top problems in email marketing. The app is amazing and I'm sure you'll love it.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
In general I couldn't say that there is something that I dislike. The support team is constantly doing improvements! Anyway to be honest I think that Encharge is still a young app and an upgrade in the future will help a lot to give the app more and more reliablity. I'm sure that the team will do it without any kind orf problems.

Recommendations to others considering Encharge:
Having a good relationship with your clients is a must in marketing. Remember that the most important thing in marketing is to be in direct touch with your client, so email marketing is super important in your business. Encharge is a non-expensive platform to be in touch with your clients so please consider it! You'll love it :D

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm solving the problems of automation and email marketing. On the other hand, as I said, you can use the broadcast option whose UE and UI are cool and easy to use.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing Automation at its Best
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Marketing Automation at its absolute best.
The power is in its simplicity. It unbelievably easy to set up complex automations, segmentation, tagging and triggers. This in turn results in actionable behavioural targeting that turns leads into customers - Exactly what you need it to do!

Their Flow designers mapping capabilities is where the magic happens. Intuitive interface for all levels of expertise. Dynamic and conditional content is easily created. The cherry on top is their website tracking which gives an overview of how visitors are interacting with your various content, which you can tag and segment again.

My final mention is the useful data and analytics collected. This has led to sound marketing decisions on how we move forward.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
As Encharge is still developing key modules, something missing to be able to complete with the big boys is:

1) Forms
2) WooCommerce Integration

Although I believe that both are on their roadmap

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing Automation and Behavioural targeting.

The beauty is in its tagging abilities. This allows for hyper-targeted emails, which in turn results in more sales - the gold standard in email strategy

all_reviews.review_title: More than a great autoresponder without a crazy monthly fee
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I like the interface of the product. I like how easy and intuitive it is to use. It has different sections : people, flows, emails, integrations. It's like having a CRM and an autoresponder all in one. The flows are the best: easy to understand and set up and integrate with Mailchimp easily.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
At the moment there is no integration with thrive themes and it's hard to trigger flows from my website without using a complicated set up but I am told this integration is coming so I am crossing my fingers. There is supposed to be an integration with zapier and integrately but the adding of tags is not working well.

Recommendations to others considering Encharge:
If you are setting up your autoresponder from scratch this is an excellent choice. Just make sure your forms on your site are integrated with encharge and you'll be good to go.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
the flows are so easy to implement. Adding tags and segment is a piece of cake. It's a lot easier than having different lists. The email campaigns are easy to set up and look beautiful.

all_reviews.review_title: Automation, Integration & All Email goodness in one.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I was using Mailchimp for my regular email needs, but then a peer had recommended Encharge, so I had a look at it. I was blown away by the simplicity of the flow builder and the number of integrations it had. I currently use bitform form plugin in WordPress, and the possibility of using webhooks to integrate with Encharge was very appealing. It works well and can now send a nurturing sequence to the members who would like to attend events. It has enabled higher attendance. The broadcast feature has a great email builder, and the emails have high deliverability rates. There are plenty more integrations available, and the event-based segmentation helps in taking the necessary steps to optimize the content based on intent.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
Would love to see more integrations with other WordPress and also independent CRMs. Also, integration with woocommerce is much needed although it is currently in their roadmap. All things considered, it is still great value for money.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I had low attendance at my events, and the reason was there was a lack of hype and enthusiasm leading towards the event once anyone registered for it. With Encharge, now I can send a series of emails in regular intervals building up the excitement and the hype, and has seen a considerable rise in the number of attendees. Best part is that emails are reaching the members' inbox.

all_reviews.review_title: Formidable Up And Coming EMS
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I've blown away by the Encharge experience and I'm in the process of migrating from ActiveCampaign, to grow our still modest list on. I've been able to do everything I needed with the functionality Encharge offers. For good measure, it's constantly improving and the team is listening to feedback, especially the issues with basic use, which should always be a priority. The onboarding process is second to none, with the founder sending a steady stream of 'hand-holding' email sequence. I'm impressed that deliverability is so much better than AC and Mailchimp which we still use for a couple of forms (not for long).

What do you dislike about Encharge?
As a startup, I would have hoped that Encharge would offer lower points per tier relative to established EMS. That said, the feature set is comparable to other EMS that are a lot more established. Hence I appreciate the rationale behind their pricing policy.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
We started using Mailchimp when we started our small business back in 2009 and it's always been a love-hate relationship. I have always found MC to be clunky and not very intuitive. Encharge on the other hand makes onboarding and starting an email sequence a breeze.

all_reviews.review_title: Very fast to use marketing automation app.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Encharge is easy and enjoyable and very fast to use, especially the flow designer.

Email delivery is also very fast after the email is triggered  (actioned to be sent) in Encharge.

You can place related and separate flows in one Flow of the Flow (automation) designer which makes it easy to create interactions, tagging, segmentation, lead scoring and email delivery for related aspects of flows. Together with the ability ability to zoom in and out of the Flow designer canvas makes, these features make it easier to see an overview of related parts of a Flow.

The Liquid language that Encharhge supports allows you to create conditional and dynamic email text content as calculations based on specific People (contact) data, and other data such as time. The results of calculations can be used to display appropriate conditional content in emails. If you know a programming language or have used other automation apps with the ability to show dynamic or conditional content then you should be able to quickly start creating personalised content for your contacts in your emails to them.

The website tracking feature allows People to interact with your website or application and for you to tag and segment them so that you can then send personalised and engaging emails to each Person.

There are no lists as such in Encharge however you can effectively create your own using the Segments feature (e.g. "Subscribers From Home Page" Segment contains all People with the Tag "used.homepage.form.to.subscribe).

What do you dislike about Encharge?
On writing this there isn't a form builder in Encharge to embed on a web page so that users of the page can submit their details to be entered into Encharge. However, a form building feature is planned on the development roadmap. I use Convertbox to allow people to submit their details and enter them into Encharge because it's already integrated with Encharge.

There are no detailed statistics to the level you may see on apps such as Mailchimp or other more mature apps. So, if you are used to detailed statistics then Encharge may not be for you. However, Encharge have a 14 day free trial, so I suggest giving it a try especially to see if the current statistics are sufficient for your requirements.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I can quickly create automation Flows and segment People into Segments (custom lists) and then send People personalised emails.

all_reviews.review_title: Best money I've spent for such a powerful tool!

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Encharge?
What do you dislike about Encharge?
What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
The ability to automate my campaigns has saved me so much time. I love that you can tell Encharge to wait a specified # of days before sending the next email or that you can add tags based on certain subscriber actions. This information is critical to tailoring campaigns to the right people.

The ability to have an accessible support team is also nice. The Encharge team is really responsive if you have questions or need a guide.

It's also nice that they have a way to monitor subscriptions and allow users to send emails accordingly with the proper reminders.  I

all_reviews.review_title: Email marketing automation made simple and fun!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Where other similar email marketing programs have difficult, clunky automation setups and processes, Encharge makes things much simpler and more intuitive without losing functionality. Even in their early stages, the prebuilt Flows and ideas they have built in are great starting points, and you can do quite a bit more with it if you're up for building your own custom Flows.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
As it's a newer product still, there are some basics that are missing. For instance, they don't have any of their own forms yet. So you'll either need to build them yourself, use one of their many third-party plugin options, or find some other work around. They're on the roadmap, but have no ETA yet.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Where I previously used similar email marketing platforms for one-off newsletters, Encharge has allowed me to really dig into automated emails much more quickly and simply than before. I'm sure I will see gains in sales over time, and it feels good just to be in the automation game after being on the sidelines for so long.

all_reviews.review_title: Great, Next-Generation Email Marketing Platform!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I've tried just about every email marketing solution that's come on the marketing over the last few years.
After my last purchase, I told myself that I was done purchasing email marketing solutions. That was until I heard about Encharge from a few friends.
Encharge is a "next-generation" email marketing platform that gives you the kind of options and control you just don't get with basic email marketing software. You can segment your list with tags and control what offers a subscriber sees, what pages they get directed to, and more.
Plus, they have a great UI (User Interface) that brings everything together in a clean, neat, easy-to-navigate package.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
The platform is fairly new, so they don't have all the integrations I use yet, but those will be rolled out in the months ahead.

Recommendations to others considering Encharge:
I highly recommend this platform. You really don't realize how limited most of the other options in the email marketing space are until you try Encharge.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Encharge enables me to segment my list. I can separate the buyers from the tire-kickers and send special offers to people who visit specific pages on my website. These are things you just can't do with most of the standard email marketing solutions that are out there.

all_reviews.review_title: Great alternative to ActiveCampaign
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I love the ease of use and how fast everything loads comparing to ActiveCampaign

What do you dislike about Encharge?
There are a couple of useful features that are still missing, but nothing to stop me from executing exactly what I need, plus they work very fast through their roadmap ideas.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have been a loyal ActiveCampaign user for years, but it has become very expensive if you really want to grow your audience, plus if I wanted to add a Facebook retargeting feature, it would shoot the cost even more. I was apprehensive to switch as I worked with Cinvertbox and Mailchimp before and ActiveCampaign came out on top on many levels, but wow, I am so surprised at the ease of use and the deliverability of Encharge. And I can confidently grow my list without constantly trying to keep it under the next tier to save some money. My email marketing is more about nurturing than sales and having to pay huge fees without direct ROI is what ActiveCampaign has lost my business.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Automation tool with a lot more to come
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
After using different email automation tools I came to a point that there are limitations. Most limitations were due to the fact that there was a lack of integration with other parties. Therefore I looked further and found Encharge.io. I have been using it now for some time and there is still so much more to discover.

Transparency: With the roadmap that is shown you see all the potentials that are still coming and which ones are already in development. Great to see and already to adapt your workflow around this

Great support: Quick and full support whenever you need.

Great community: You see in the FB group that people are helping each other and suggest future updates. Encharge also listens to this community and interacts.

The flow builder: The flow builder is easy to use and compared to others it works more or less the same but has some extra features and details you can add. Also the automated arrangement is great, especially when you made a real spaghetti of your automation haha.

Tag manager: To see who is interested in what and who is ready for making a sale (potentially) the tag manager function is great. You have the ability to segment people so precisely. This is also because people can have the same tag on one field but do not persee having them on another field.

Still building: Encharge is still relatively new. They already have great integrations and are also building more. Also with features that still can be added, some are already in the list of future plans others not. But as said before with the fact that they listen to the community; great potential will happen.

Overall, I am blown away by Encharge.io and see the future potential of it. Great communication and community is a big plus. Also compared to competitors you see that the market presence is not that high yet but the functionalities are already enormous beating most of the competitors. Especially compared with the pricing.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
Still missing some integration with e-commerce

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Making all my e-mail marketing and lead generation and warmup fully automated

all_reviews.review_title: Cost-effective Email Marketing Tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
A solid alternative to ActiveCampaign that helps you engage more subscribers and segment them to your needs.
On my first use, I was pleasantly surprised how fast and well thought is the UI:
* beautiful and easy to use dashboard
* each tab loads very fast
* the search bar is very useful
* quick-start onboarding process
* drag and drop email builder
* robust features: Flows + Segmentation
* generous contact allowances / multiple domains

What do you dislike about Encharge?
I'm still in the very early stage of using it but I already like it and I wish to see sign-up forms, more in-depth video tutorials on feature use cases, and more explanation videos added to the knowledge base + native integrations.

Recommendations to others considering Encharge:
I wish they would make more native integrations

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email Automation - Onboarding process

all_reviews.review_title: Need An Upgrade For Email Marketing
First Time Using Email Automation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
This is my first entry into email automation. The interface is nicely designed with an easy layout to follow. When I log in to review the data is easy to find. The dashboard shows a summary of people, email flows, etc.

What I'm most looking forward to is email automation creating different flows. This is the reason I choose to purchase the Encharge app service. I'm a visual learner. There is a lot of manipulation that can be created with the flows of emails. The journey for my customers will be tailored to their experiences.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
When I first started connecting the app to my site I was not sure what to expect. I tried a few different techniques. The most helpful was integrating my site to Encharge.io with Zapier. I recommend that route for the easiest path. There are other helpful guides on the Encharge site to provide other processes for integration as well. I believe Encharge is working on creating their own forms to embed in websites. This would be a welcome addition. That would cut down on using Zapier.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I expect a wide variety of questions and challenges that my members will ask or discuss. This service will help segment my members and newsletter followers into different paths for their own journey.

all_reviews.review_title: Great features, exceptional customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I have really enjoyed Encharge. Having used it for two months, I can say that I have really enjoyed the more advanced segmentation features. These allow you to segment and tag your contacts based on their behaviour on your website, not just how they interact with your emails.

The workflow feature is very intuitive, similar to ActiveCampaign. However combining it with the segmentation effective tagging, makes managing your contacts.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
To be honest, there isn't much to not like. I haven't found any glaring bugs or issues (yet). Anytime I have been stuck, I've found answers in their tutorials and their support team have been very forthcoming and prompt.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Firstly, it's the ease of use and the UX. I've found it easy to navigate around. Tools like AC have added more features (such as pages) more recently and complicated the interface. I have to hunt around for what I want to do. The Encharge interface is intuitive and you get used to where things are very quickly. So speed and efficiency are big factors. This includes the built-in workflows which you can copy and then amend. Again similar to AC, but they've been really well thought out.

all_reviews.review_title: Great competition for the big boys!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I really like their drag-and-drop builder, which makes it really easy to build out automated email flows. I also really like that they have the website tracking and lead scoring features. Behavior-based segmentation is a great plus as well. My experience with their support is very good and Kalo, one of the founders, is very accessible. Encharge also has integrations with major apps on the market.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
They are missing some ecommerce integrations and they don't have Thrive Leads integration YET. However, from what I've read on their Facebook group, they are working hard to get those as well.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am very happy with Encharge. I think it's a very decent email marketing automation software with everything I need to automate my email marketing campaigns. It also allows me to track the behaviour of visitors on my website, segment them and take specific actions based on set triggers. Encharge is a very viable alternative to the big names currently on the market. I will continue using them as it is still early days for them and they will only get better. All in all, Encharge is a great tool and I have no hesitation to recommend.

all_reviews.review_title: Most amazing tool for email marketing!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
I have been looking for a good email marketing tool for so long. I have use most of the famous email marketing tools in the market like mailchimp, convertkit, active campaign etc.

Overall, Encharge is really amazing! Why?

Here's Why..

All my email marketing needs from lead capturing, lead nurtuing to sales.

all_reviews.review_title: A great tool for automation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
The thing I liked most and which I find truly genius about this Encharge is that you can start your automation with a webhook. A lot of platforms do not have default integrations, but do offer webhooks.
So being able to start with a webhook opens so many opportunities where you can use Encharge for.

On top of that you will pay less for third-party platforms you usually need to connect both platforms.

Another thing I really like is the workflow of the segmentation. Unengaged subscribers will be noticed much quicker because it only takes you 1 click to get there when you look at your contacts. This way, you can set up and run quick re-engaging campaigns.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
What I like least about Encharge is that some crucial things are missing. My nr1 at this moment is not being able to manage all the tags that you have created.  Once you have imported your contacts and tagged them, there is no way to remove the tag. The only available option is to open the list of contacts and remove them manually one by one, which is an impossible thing when your account has thousands of subscribers.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Encharge you are able to connect many platforms that do not have default integrations. Because you can start your automation flows with a webhook, you can now connect any platform that offers a webhook. This solves a big problem in the industry. Also, a great benefit is that you no longer need third-party applications that you normally would need to create those connections.

all_reviews.review_title: Only Email Marketing you need to grow
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
No matter how much you love your email marketing tools, it's nearly impossible to become an advanced user of any program without taking a class or following tons of tutorials online. Encharge is completely different in this respect, as the interface is so intuitive that you'll be able to get started right away and achieve a deeper level of email automation than you ever thought possible.

I love Encharge because literally there's no limit in it- Unlimited Emails, Unlimited Automation Flows, Unlimited Users & Unlimited Tags! In addition to that, it uses SendGrid and Amazon Web Services, which means my emails will be sent with speed and accuracy!

What do you dislike about Encharge?
No cold email functionality availble in encharge.
Links included in email are showing encharge website. It should be my own domain.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending followup emails to clients are tough task if you do manually. We have tried a few softwares but they are costly for what feature we want.

Encharge definitely exceeded my expectation. Thank you @Encharge team, for this fantastic tool!

all_reviews.review_title: Encharge: Must-Have  Marketing Automation & Segmentation Tools
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Encharge allows me to automate various email marketing processes with powerful behavior-based segmentation. I can set up even complex automation flows easily with the drag and drop visual editor. Also, I can do A/B testing easily and effectively.

Encharge has many integrations already. If there is no integration for my specific applications, I can still use the powerful Send/Receive Webhook feature. Using the Encharge Webhook, I could connect Kadence Blocks' form on my WordPress site to Encharge quickly and easily. It's usually impossible, or I need to use Zapier that I don't want to use it.

Also, Encharge's automation and segmentation capabilities do not just apply to email marketing. For example, it's also applicable to create Facebook audiences. I always add UTM Tags to email links for tracking, so Encharge's automatic UTM Tags generation and appending is super helpful. There are so many things I can automate and segment in Encharge!

Customer support is also great. I always get a quick response.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
While Encharge does not offer deep e-commerce integration yet, I believe it can surpass competitors like Klaviyo if they launch this feature. Also, I don't need it right now.

Recommendations to others considering Encharge:
I highly recommend it if you are looking for email marketing automation with powerful segmentation.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I know the best way to keep email marketing campaigns alive is by segmenting lists. This will lead to higher open and clickthrough rates, but setting up the perfect automated segmentation can be difficult. I looked for an easy solution, and Encharge has been fantastic!

all_reviews.review_title: Highly Recommended and Best User Friendly Email Marketing Software To use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
Over the past few years, I've used email marketing software such as ActiveCampaign, Mailchimp, Mailerlite and most recently Gmass.

I've left all of them because I've found it very hard to use because it had all the bells and whistles which initially sounded great. But when you start to use them it actually confused me more and I got frustrated because all I wanted to set up was an automated email funnel system of emails to send to my clients.

Then I discovered Encharge.io and WOW!

I initially thought this software was too simplistic and didn't have much on the surface, but when I started to use it, I realised how powerful it was and keeping it user friendly made my whole experience extremely memorable.

Just like Apple with the iPhones, Macbooks and iPads where they keep it simple actually means I could do more.

It's the same with Encharge.

What I love about them are:
- User interface is clean simply and very intitutive
- Has a lot of integrations and I love the webhooks, which means a lot of times it doesn't cost extra to have a middle integration layer
- The emails are being sent via SendGrid which is extremely reliable and that's what I've been using for a very long time
- Support is excellent and they have been really responsive.

Thank you for creating an amazing email software that has saved me so much time and made my life so much easier.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
There's not too much I dislike. I would like to see the following added:
- Allow us to sort the emails section in alphabetic order so I can see the titles
- Allow us to change the view of the email section to have a list view
- Add a comparison of month to month reporting in the metrics section

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
I used to manually enter in some of my leads from Activecampaign to my CRM because there was no integration component directly.

This solved that huge problem.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
PROS: They have automation flows (build from scratch or use a premade template) for drip newsletters, follow-up emails with customers, and MULTIPLE custom domains you can send from. So I can send emails from company A or Company B.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
CONS: At such a young stage, I would have hoped to see their prices a bit lower to gain traction, but they are very comparable to MailChimp so i can see why their prices are such today. It is reasonable pricing, but I can see it grow.

Recommendations to others considering Encharge:
Keep an eye out for their development roadmap rolling out the SMS and other contact options if that is what you are interested in

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
OVERALL: Easy to use like Mailchimp, but with easy drag-n-drop builder HTML newsletters with templates pre-made. I can send from multiple verified email domains and create automation triggered by activity such as "has opened email" or "has not clicked" for drip campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: A very powerful and easy-to-use email automation tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Encharge?
The automations in Encharge (they call them 'Flows') are extremely powerful and customizable. There are also loads of integrations to do things like, eg. add a lead to a Facebook audience after they have clicked a link on your website. Encharge is also very flexible. Other tools I have tried make it difficult to use multiple domains and multiple email addresses. The process is very simple in Encharge. One thing that has been really good for us is the 'sub-accounts', since we run a number of different websites for ourselves and for clients. We use sub-accounts to keep these all nice and separate.

What do you dislike about Encharge?
The onboarding and training process could be a little smoother. A tool that has this many features takes time to learn.The basic tutorials are available, but it would be good to have more how-to's for advanced topics.

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Encharge to send regular newsletters to our readers, and also to set up automated campaigns to send them offers, and to follow-up with re-targeting ads.

Having said that, I visited their roadmap and understand that both these are already planned, which made me cross the fence in their favor. I wish they had more native integrations to make it a truly one-stop platform for digital marketers.

* Easy to use, featureful, and VERY conveniently priced
* Excellent and rersponsive support
* Already production ready, no worries for the future
* Folders! Yes, as basic as this might sound, many other systems lack a way to classify your flows and emails, which makes it such a mess! With Encharge I can organize my work no matter how complex it is

What do you dislike about Encharge?
I can't define these points as "dislikes", as the overall pros cover up for them. However, there are some areas of improvement. Such as:
* Flow builder usability. I couldn't select multiple items in the flow builder at once to enhance my layout. I'd love to see this improved, although it's a very minor issue
* Native eCommerce (Woo, Shopify, ...) and Wordpress integration (a workaround is to use webhooks, zapier, or integrately)

So far, that's about it

What problems is Encharge solving and how is that benefiting you?
Encharge helped me keep my contacts well organized, and able to flexibly create automated campaignes in an easy and featureful manner
